methods.name: base64Encode
methods.documentation:
Encode a string to base64
- Parameter raw: The string to encode
- Returns: Base64 encoded string

methods.name: base64Decode
methods.documentation:
Decode a base64 string
- Parameter raw: The base64 string to decode
- Returns: Decoded string, or nil if the input is invalid

returns.description: Decoded string, or nil if the input is invalid

methods.name: md5
methods.documentation:
Generate MD5 hash of a string
- Parameter data: The string to hash
- Returns: Hexadecimal MD5 hash

methods.name: sha1
methods.documentation:
Generate SHA1 hash of a string
- Parameter data: The string to hash
- Returns: Hexadecimal SHA1 hash

methods.name: sha256
methods.documentation:
Generate SHA256 hash of a string
- Parameter data: The string to hash
- Returns: Hexadecimal SHA256 hash

methods.name: sha512
methods.documentation:
Generate SHA512 hash of a string
- Parameter data: The string to hash
- Returns: Hexadecimal SHA512 hash

methods.name: hmacMD5
methods.signature: func hmacMD5(_ key: String, _ data: String) -> String
methods.documentation:
Generate HMAC-MD5 of a string with a key
- Parameters:
- key: The secret key
- data: The data to authenticate
- Returns: Hexadecimal HMAC-MD5

methods.name: hmacSHA1
methods.signature: func hmacSHA1(_ key: String, _ data: String) -> String
methods.documentation:
Generate HMAC-SHA1 of a string with a key
- Parameters:
- key: The secret key
- data: The data to authenticate
- Returns: Hexadecimal HMAC-SHA1

methods.name: hmacSHA256
methods.signature: func hmacSHA256(_ key: String, _ data: String) -> String
methods.documentation:
Generate HMAC-SHA256 of a string with a key
- Parameters:
- key: The secret key
- data: The data to authenticate
- Returns: Hexadecimal HMAC-SHA256

methods.name: hmacSHA512
methods.signature: func hmacSHA512(_ key: String, _ data: String) -> String
methods.documentation:
Generate HMAC-SHA512 of a string with a key
- Parameters:
- key: The secret key
- data: The data to authenticate
- Returns: Hexadecimal HMAC-SHA512
